mapper.update: UPDATE freeroom SET status = 'shutdown' WHERE host = #{host}
mapper.select: SELECT room.id, room.room_id, room.maximum, room.server, room.update_time, host.id, file.src hostAvatar, host.nick_name hostName, room.password, room.description, room.create_time FROM freeroom room INNER JOIN `user` host ON host.id = room.host LEFT JOIN upload_file file ON file.id = host.head WHERE room.id = #{id}

SELECT room.id, room.room_id, room.maximum, room.server, room.update_time, host.id, file.src hostAvatar, host.nick_name hostName, room.password, room.description, room.create_time, room.status FROM freeroom room INNER JOIN `user` host ON host.id = room.host LEFT JOIN upload_file file ON file.id = host.head WHERE room.host = #{id} AND room.status != 'shutdown'
mapper.update: UPDATE freeroom SET status = CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, expire_time, NOW()) >= 3 THEN 'shutdown' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, expire_time, NOW()) >= 0 THEN 'inactive' ELSE 'active' END
